about.title: About Me
about.description: Systems Engineer based in Canada specialized in Web React and Asp.Net applications, in my free time I practice photography and ski alpin.

n1.name: CGI
n1.description: Currently I am as a senior consultant, developing and designing applications in React in FrontEnd and the Back End development Api's with Asp.net Core and as a SQL database

n2.name: Systematix
n2.description: Designed and developed responsive web applications using React and RESTful API with SQL. One of the tools developed was focused on performing the analysis for the approval or denial of life insurance

n3.name: Evolution IT
n3.description: In this project developing the EpX application. With this app, businesses can manage all their documentation online, allowing them to get closer to their 'paperless' goal. EpX complies with the requirements and regulations of the National General Archives of Colombia, as well as with the ISO Content Management Standards.

n4.name: Periferia
n4.description: Personnel management in Aguile Scrum methodology and Development of applications on demand for Falabella de Colombia client in .NET C # with SCRUM methodology, management of MVC 5, Entity Framework 6, WorkFlow, LinQ, Telerik Kendo Ui components, html5, CSS3 and javascript, SQL server 2012 and reporting services.

n5.name: Accenture
n5.description: In charge of estimating and projections of new projects and modifications, carrying out the documentation, Development in platform .net framework C #, Handling of WCF, MVC3, ASP.NET technologies, Windows Forms workflow handling of SQL 2008 database (trigger, stored procedure), ETL, Reporting Services, Oralce with knowledge of design patterns.

n6.name: Verytel
n6.description: Work in an application developed on the C # .net framework platform, it is a service-oriented client server application, handle technologies such as WCF, MVC3, SQL 2008 database management workflow (trigger, stored procedure).
